comprehensive_overview: aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, BitTorrent and Metalink. aria2 can be manipulated via built-in JSON-RPC and XML-RPC interfaces.
core_features: Supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, BitTorrent, and Metalink protocols
Highly customizable with many settings and configurations
Supports segmented downloading for faster speeds
Command-line interface for ease of use
Can be controlled through JSON-RPC and XML-RPC interfaces
